issue.body: Fix #30416. Before (it shows as "Unset" while there's a token): After: The username shows as "oauth2" because of https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/f9fdac9809335729b2ac3227b2a5f71a62fc64ad/services/migrations/dump.go#L99 I have checked that all usage of `MirrorRemoteAddress` has been updated. However, it needs to be checked again when backporting.

issue.body: Backport #30429 by @wolfogre Fix #30416. Before (it shows as "Unset" while there's a token): After: The username shows as "oauth2" because of https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/f9fdac9809335729b2ac3227b2a5f71a62fc64ad/services/migrations/dump.go#L99 I have checked that all usage of `MirrorRemoteAddress` has been updated. However, it needs to be checked again when backporting.

body:
At step 3, what happens if touch "Authorization"? Looks like only username/password is allowed here for mirror settings, while  github requires access token. 
![1713050028845](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/24548477/1a2ad18b-8b56-4715-afaa-844ad9d80033)

> At step 3, what happens if touch "Authorization"? Looks like only username/password is allowed here for mirror settings, while github requires access token. ![1713050028845](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/24548477/322235246-1a2ad18b-8b56-4715-afaa-844ad9d80033.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..S1kI-WWsa4GX3jwSJ2zFzuR2p0z26nKkoJFa99arApY)

Then the token will be filled into password and username will a generated name. I think this place needs a refactor in future.

issue.body: Fix #30416. Backport #30429 Before (it shows as "Unset" while there's a token): After: The username shows as "oauth2" because of https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/f9fdac9809335729b2ac3227b2a5f71a62fc64ad/services/migrations/dump.go#L99 I have checked that all usage of `MirrorRemoteAddress` has been updated. However, it needs to be checked again when backporting.
